entry.title: Numbers Everyone Should Know
entry.summary:
"Numbers everyone should know" by Jeff Dean:

  • L1 cache reference 0.5ns
  • L2 cache reference 7ns
  • Main memory reference 100ns
  • Disk seek 10,000,000ns
  • Read 1MB sequentially from memory 250,000ns
  • Read 1MB sequentially from network 10,000,000ns
  • Read 1MB sequentially from disk 30,000,000ns
  • Mutex lock/unlock 100ns

Related Articles:

  • Numbers Everyone Should Know from highscalability.com
  • Google Pro Tip: Use Back-Of-The-Envelope-Calculations To Choose The Best Design from highscalability.com
